original_text: Someone told Saul, ‘Look at what the army is doing. They are eating meat that still has blood in it. That is a sin against the Lord.’
korean_text: 무리가 사울에게 전하여 이르되 보소서 백성이 고기를 피째 먹어 여호와께 범죄하였나이다 사울이 이르되 너희가 믿음 없이 행하였도다 이제 큰 돌을 내게로 굴려 오라 하고

sentences.original_text: Look at what the army is doing
that still has blood in it
That is a sin against the Lord
